name: X-OUT (2020)
description:
X-OUT is a game of strategic action, but yet very simple.

You must dodge all the Xs thrown your way in a matter of seconds, and if you intend to survive the game, you must do this with great strategy, as those who don’t will be X-ED OUT and Game Over.

Climb your way up the pyramid, and learn to dodge the Xs with great talent as you will need it to make it through the game.

In X-OUT, they are three levels of gameplay:
A Tutorial Level.
This level is designed to get you used to the game and to assist your build-up to great strategy to complete the game.

The 2nd Level. Full of Strategy.
The 2nd level of the game is made to put the skills you learned in the tutorial to the test.

Level 3. In Color.
The 3rd level of X-OUT is designed to test everything you learned over the last two levels; facing cross-obstacles, and X-like enemies gone mad, the 3rd level is the hardest to survive.
